## XForm.lookAt() method

Sets the local tranformation matrix by a look-at matrix

**Signature:**

```typescript
lookAt(eye: Vector3, target: Vector3, up: Vector3): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eye | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The eye position used to make the look-at matrix |
|  target | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The target position used to make the look-at matrix |
|  up | [Vector3](doc/markdown/./base.vector3.md) | The up vector used to make the look-at matrix |

**Returns:**

this

self
